references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational method for novel view synthesis that many subsequent scene stylization methods build upon.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting (3DGS), the core rendering technique used in the proposed ReGS method, enabling real-time performance.
This paper proposes ARF, a state-of-the-art method for scene stylization that serves as a strong baseline for comparison in the ReGS paper.

references.paper_title: Ref-NPR: Reference-based non-photorealistic radiance fields for controllable scene stylization
references.reason: This paper focuses on reference-based scene stylization, a related approach to the ReGS method, providing valuable context and a direct comparison.

references.paper_title: SNeRF: stylized neural implicit representations for 3D scenes
references.reason: This paper is another strong baseline for comparison, showcasing a different approach to neural scene stylization using implicit representations.
